record.title: MOMENT OF SILENCE FOR THE PEOPLE OF BURMA
record.narrative:
MOMENT OF SILENCE FOR THE PEOPLE OF BURMA -- (House of Representatives - May 13, 2008)

[Page: H3751]
(Mr. CROWLEY asked and was given permission to address the House for 1 minute.)

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, my colleagues, we just passed a resolution expressing the condolences and sympathy of the House of Representatives to the people of Burma, who are suffering incredible loss of life and destruction, mass destruction, within Burma because of the effects of Cyclone Nargis.

I would ask, if we could, on behalf of the suffering people of Burma, the millions of people who are without clean water, without proper sanitary conditions, without food, who are suffering incredibly, if we could stand for a moment of silence in their memory and on behalf of all the people of Burma today.

record.chair: Members will rise and observe a moment of silence.
